name: Memento Mori (itch) (Mumumu)
description:
Memento Mori

A Game project for learning the basics of Construct2 and Game-Design.

Description

Memento Mori is a 2D Action RPG with a Top-View Perspective.

Slay some Zombies and Skelletons in a Diablo-like Gothic Adventure

Controls

WASD/Mouse: Control the Player
M1:Attack M2:Throw
